content: You guys know that you can call someone great without calling them THE greatest, right? It’s crazy, it’s like a group of 5 year olds getting together & talking about sports. “LeBron is the greatest basketball player ever! In fact, he’s the greatest at every sport ever! If he played hockey, he’d already be better than Gretzky! & he’d be the best quarterback in football ever! & I bet he could beat Superman in a fight!” just calm down, TRY not to put EVERYTHING in historical terms, & stop letting recency bias dictate every single opinion you form.
